---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse) # praise be
```

```{r}
dat <- rnorm(n = 10000, 34*23, 18*20)
samples <- seq(1:10000)
df <- data.frame("dat" = dat,
                 "samples" = samples)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(dat)) +
  geom_density() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = c(348,1682)) +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(dat)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 10) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = c(348, 1682)) +
  theme_minimal()
```
